title: What font is this? School?
content:
Please help, I want this font?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [delete.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820074414/http:/typophile.com/files/delete.png) | 126.44 KB |
author: dontbugme

comments.content:
It looks like **[Romeo DN](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820074414/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Romeodn%20-%20Medium%20Bold&fid=c75af09ab58d1ae721e305a7be544e5f&fsize=48&text=McCreary%20School&fit=1)** shareware font by Mike Allard (De Nada Industries, 1992)

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820074414/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
